author: dildick
body: @rekovic @EmanuelPerez As discussed at the Phase-2 Upgrade Workshop, here is a proposal for a Phase-2  L1T Muon dataformat. It is derived from the stage-2 L1T Muon and will be used as input for the displaced muon trigger. It does not affect run-2 eras. `L1T::MuonPhase2` should only be produced in phase-2 eras.
title: Phase-2 L1T Muon dataformat
